patthana8.11:4.1: Narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:4.2: Narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:4.3: Narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpī ca naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.11:5.1: Naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:5.2: Naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:5.3: Naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpī ca naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.11:6.1: Narūpiñca naarūpiñca dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:6.2: Narūpiñca naarūpiñca dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:6.3: Narūpiñca naarūpiñca dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpī ca naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.11:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
